snippet: The clashes between the Lebanese Army and Sunni extremist fighters from the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, who occupied a Lebanese border town last weekend, showed some signs of easing on Wednesday.
abstract: Clashes between Lebanese Army and Sunni extremist fighters from Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, who occupied Lebanese border town, show signs of easing as collapsed cease-fire is revived.
lead_paragraph: The clashes between the Lebanese Army and Sunni extremist fighters from the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria, who occupied a Lebanese border town last weekend, showed some signs of easing on Wednesday.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
